message:
Invalid yaml: $.pipeline.stages[0].stage.spec.execution: is missing but it is required
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.spec.infrastructure.infrastructureDefinition: is missing but it is required
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.tags: is not defined in the schema and the schema does not allow additional properties
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.spec.infrastructure.useFromStage: is missing but it is required
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.type: is not defined in the schema and the schema does not allow additional properties
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.spec: is not defined in the schema and the schema does not allow additional properties
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.spec.infrastructure.environmentRef: is missing but it is required
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.spec.infrastructure.environment: is missing but it is required
$.pipeline.stages[0].stage.type: does not have a value in the enumeration [CI, Approval, FeatureFlag]
